hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # 10th of the month. Quarterly. H H 10 3,6,9,12 *

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors ##php5.6 spreadsheet_2_dwca.php jenkins 727
#The legacy 727.tar.gz was renamed to 727_24Oct2017.tar.gz. #We're going to use the latter moving forward. #This legacy DwCA was lastly generated by: spreadsheet_2_dwca.php _ 727. #That was back in 24Oct2017.
##this will be the new connector moving forward: php5.6 727.php jenkins #generates 727.tar.gz
php5.6 resource_utility.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "727_meta_recoded", "task": "metadata_recoding"}' #generates 727_meta_recoded.tar.gz
